user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an update to me (sarah.jennings@insuranceco.com) about the patient’s eligibility for the HealFast program. Remind him to check his Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for HealFast Program Eligibility Update

Hi Dr. Matthews,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me an update on the patient’s eligibility for the HealFast program? You can email the details directly to sarah.jennings@insuranceco.com.

For reference, please check your Gmail and Notion workspace, as the latest information you’ll need should be available there.

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,  
Sarah

final_output:
Subject: Request for HealFast Program Eligibility Update

Hi Dr. Matthews,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me an update on the patient’s eligibility for the HealFast program? You can email the details directly to sarah.jennings@insuranceco.com.

For reference, please check your Gmail and Notion workspace, as the latest information you’ll need should be available there.

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,  
Sarah
